bug.author: wuisawesome
bug.summary: [New scheduler] Queued ready tasks may be reported as infeasible in heartbeat
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
When the cluster is fully utilized, tasks which are feasible but not schedulable may be incorrectly classified as infeasible. This has no consequences because we always treat both sets of tasks the same way. Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS): <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.
